miic3.utils.datatype.Field¶

class miic3.utils.datatype.Field(data=array([], shape=(0, 0), dtype=float64), header=<miic3.utils.datatype.Header object>)[source]¶

A two dimensional field of numbers of the same type (physical quantity)

Parameters

  • data (two dimensional numpy.array) – numerical values of the field

  • header (Header) – meta informatiom of the physical quantity

__init__(data=array([], shape=(0, 0), dtype=float64), header=<miic3.utils.datatype.Header object>)[source]¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
